papers.title: HPLC method for simultaneous quantification of lumacaftor and ivacaftor bulk and pharmaceutical formulations
papers.abstract_snippet: A straightforward HPLC approach was developed using a monolithic silica stationary phase with gradient elution (acetonitrile/phosphate buffer) for simultaneous analysis of lumacaftor/ivacaftor combinations. The method demonstrated successful application in bulk and pharmaceutical formulation evaluations with avanafil as internal standard.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Directly describes HPLC method development for lumacaftor analysis in pharmaceutical formulations using novel stationary phase and gradient elution.

papers.title: Liquid chromatographic determination of lumacaftor in the presence of ivacaftor and degradation products using a fused-core F5 column with mass spectrometry
papers.abstract_snippet: Quantitation of lumacaftor alongside degradation products and ivacaftor was achieved using a pentafluorophenylpropyl stationary phase with gradient elution. Five novel degradation products were identified via high-resolution mass spectrometry.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Presents comprehensive HPLC analysis of lumacaftor with degradation profiling and mass spectrometry characterization.
